thread.title: Chris Brown's ex-girlfriend Karrueche Tran gets restraining order against the star after he 'threatened to kill her'
thread.title_full: Chris Brown's ex-girlfriend Karrueche Tran gets restraining order against the star after he 'threatened to kill her'

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Chris Brown's ex-girlfriend Karrueche Tran gets restraining order against the star after he 'threatened to kill her'
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Chris Brown's ex-girlfriend has reportedly got a restraining order 
The R&B singer has apparently been ordered to stay away from Karrueche Tran after she filed legal documentation. 
According to reports, she claimed in the documents that Chris has previously threatened her. 
In a statement given earlier this month, she also allegedly said that the With You singer once "punched me in my stomach twice," and "pushed me down the stairs." Chris has reportedly been ordered to stay away (Photo: Instagram) Chris and ex Karrueche split up two years ago (Photo: Flynet) 
The legal docs also claim Chris has threatened to harm her friends and those close to her. 
It comes just weeks after Chris admitted he's a 'stalker' kind of boyfriend. 
The US singer went on a bizarre rant in the early hours of Tuesday morning about his love life. 
“Ladies y’all be complaining about n being like stalkers, in love with y’all [and all] kinds of crazy s*** and get tired of it…well guess what? I’m one of them n
